summary: This allows you to change the Textures installed by Seranaholic mod. I was disappointed with the lack of selection so I welcome this into my collection of Customizers :)
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img921/1843/P3DvDT.png[/img]

[url=https://www.facebook.com/ClearanceClarenceMods][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/640x480q90/924/cG7PGI.png[/img][/url]

[size=3]This mod allows you to change the way Serana looks. You can change the body textures and face textures

[color=#6aa84f]Works with latest version of Seranaholic (1.8) [/color][/size]

[img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/320x240q90/922/tUyKv0.png[/img]

[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38326/?]Seranaholic[/url][/size]
[size=4]If you plan to use  TBBP meshes, you also require the following:[/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54044/?]HDT Breast And Butt Physics[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton - XPMS [/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE[/url][/size]

[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/2578/9D7W5O.png[/img]

[color=#0b8db3][size=6]Manual Installation[/size][/color]
[size=3]Download the package you want and extract it using WinRar. Now you have 3 folders. Base, FOMod and Options. Delete the FOMod folder since you won't need it. Now go to the base folder and select the bodytype you want and open that folder and copy the .nif files to [i][color=#6aa84f]data\meshes\actor\character\Serana[/color][/i] and overwrite the .nif files. Now the body is installed. Now go into the options folder and chose what kind of texture you want. Once you find it open it and copy all the files to [color=#6aa84f][i]data\textures\actor\character\Serana[/i].[/color]

Same procedure for Valerica[/size]

[color=#0B8DB3][size=6]Credits[/size][/color]
[size=5][color=#0B8DB3]Body Meshes[/color][/size]

[size=3][color=#0A7A9B]CBBE Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url][/i][/size]

[size=3][color=#0A7A9B]UNP Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNP Blessed Body[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40156/?]UNPC Body v2dot5[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35748/?]UNPetite[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41051/?]UNP Topmodel[/url][/i][/size]
